xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: eXist specific extension functions for RESTXQ
Registers all resource functions identified in the XQuery Module with the RestXQ Registry.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $module A URI pointing to an XQuery module.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: document-node() : The list of newly registered resource functions.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Deregisters all resource functions identified in the XQuery Module from the RestXQ Registry.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $module A URI pointing to an XQuery module.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: document-node() : The list of deregistered resource functions.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Compiles the XQuery Module and examines it, producing a list of all the declared resource functions.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $module A URI pointing to an XQuery module.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: document-node() : The list of newly registered resource functions.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: exrest:register-resource-function
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: exrest:register-resource-function($module as xs:anyURI, $function-signature as xs:string) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Registers a resource function from the XQuery Module with the RestXQ Registry.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $module A URI pointing to an XQuery module.
$function-signature A signature identifying a resource function. Takes the format {namespace}local-name#arity e.g. {http://somenamespace}some-function#2
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:boolean : true if the function was registered, false otherwise.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: exrest:deregister-resource-function
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: exrest:deregister-resource-function($module as xs:anyURI, $function-signature as xs:string) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Deregisters a resource function from the RestXQ Registry.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $module A URI pointing to an XQuery module.
$function-signature A signature identifying a resource function. Takes the format {namespace}local-name#arity e.g. {http://somenamespace}some-function#2
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:boolean : true if the function was deregistered, false otherwise.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets a list of all the invalid XQuery modules discovered by RESTXQ in the process of discovering resource functions.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:string* : The list of invalid XQuery modules.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets a list of all the missing dependencies for XQuery modules discovered by RESTXQ in the process of discovering resource functions.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: document-node() : The list of missing dependencies.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets a list of all the dependencies of compiled XQuery modules discovered by RESTXQ in the process of discovering resource functions.
